document_data.name: Javelin
document_data.mainbody: '''''Javelin''''' was an uncommon [[evocation]] spell of the [[southern magic]] tradition.{{Southernmagic}}
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell caused a [[javelin]] to become filled with energy. When thrown, the javelin struck a target without error within the spells range, which was 80 yard (73 meter).
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required a [[material component]], an ordinary javelin.
